content: Why do you assume it's a bug? This can be affected by addons and the setting>composition pane's setting for paragraph vs body text is also a culprit.

creator: f_lawrentz

content: I don't know why Thunderbird is the culprit, as you also access the mail via other items. My suggestion is to first carefully review the setup for the account on each device. Are they all IMAP, or are some POP? And what are the specific settings for each? For example, one of those setups might be POP and set to download and delete after x days. That is a challenge seen regularly here where users access mail across more than one platform.
creator: davidsk
